Name: Eenvistweevis
Review Text: We booked a table for 3 for Saturday night. Three hours before dinner they called us and told us the booking was cancelled because they overbooked the restaurant. Great service…

Name: Eenvistweevis
Review Text: Quality, unpretentious dining and friendly staff. The flavours are simple and delicate but tasty. Great atmosphere sitting out by the water in the evening.

Name: Eenvistweevis
Review Text: Very nice "livingroom" type restaurant with locally caught fish. Very friendly waiter and good food. We will come again.

Name: Eenvistweevis
Review Text: Worst restaurant ever tried in Amsterdam. Waited for more than an hour for my food, and the waitress was unfriendly. Besides, the food is NOT OK.

Name: Eenvistweevis
Review Text: Talented chef who prepares food with a simple direct flair. Seats only 25 persons so best to reserve unless you are dining early.

Name: Eenvistweevis
Review Text: Well prepared,  fresh fish dishes. Also vegetarian and meat options available.  Here's the chef sharing a glass of wine with us!

Name: Eenvistweevis
Review Text: Small intimate restaurant. Wait staff had helpful suggestions. Fresh, perfectly cooked fish that was wonderfully flavored and nice vegetables.

Name: Eenvistweevis
Review Text: Amazing restaurant! Everything was delicious. Believe the posted reviews by other clients.

Name: Eenvistweevis
Review Text: Perfect cozy restaurant. Very few tables so make sure you have a reservation. Excellent food and presentation.

Name: Eenvistweevis
Review Text: We tried 3 different fish dishes and they all were very bad. Haven't eaten so tasteless fish in my life. I am very dissapointed.

Name: Eenvistweevis
Review Text: stumbled over this place by chance. amazing food, cozy place, sweet people. expect some spot on fish and great wines.
